document.full_text: california regulators may open a formal examination of at&t inc's proposed $39 billion purchase of t-mobile usa, a move that could delay or add conditions to approval of the deal.
document.title: california may review at&t/t-mobile usa deal
lines_and_colors: california regulators may open a formal examination of at&t inc's proposed $39 billion purchase of t-mobile usa, a move that could delay or add conditions to approval of the deal.
